item.title: The State of The Windows App SDK
item.author: z4pf1sh
item.description:
The State of The Windows App SDK

It’s spring time! Come and see Microsoft’s latest and greatest installment of the famous long-running series: Who Wants to Make The Best UI Framework! This article contains insights on things to pay attention to, and a quick tour for getting started for everyone interested in developing apps with the Windows App SDK.

item.title: A Rant About The Consistency of Windows
item.author: z4pf1sh
item.description:
A Rant About The Consistency of Windows

Born on November 10, 1983, Windows, at the time still based on MS-DOS, finally introduces the graphical user interface (GUI) to people using IBM PC (or its clones).

Follow the path of history, as we shed some light onto one of the greatest weaknesses in terms of user experience of Windows - historical relics and inconsistency.
